text: The 2017 Rally Mexico (formally known as the Rally Guanajuato Mexico 2017) was a motor racing event for rally cars that was held over four days between 9 and 12 March 2017. Kris Meeke and Paul Nagle from Citroën Total Abu Dhabi WRT won the rally. ==Entry list== {| | {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="font-size: 85%" ! scope=row colspan="7" style="text-align: center;" | Notable entrants |- ! scope=col | ! scope=col | Entrant ! scope=col | ! scope=col | Driver ! scope=col | Co-driver ! scope=col | Car ! scope=col | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 1 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 2 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 3 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 4 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 5 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 6 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 7 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 8 | Citroën Total Abu Dhabi WRT | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 10 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 11 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text- align: center;" | 37 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! scope=row style="text-align: center;" | 12 | | align="center" | WRC | | | | align="center" | |- ! colspan="7" |Source: |} | valign="top" | {| align="right" class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! colspan="2" | Key |- !
